self.title: CDISC ADaM National Early Warning Score 2 Clinical Classification Parameter Code Terminology

definition: A parameter code codelist for the National Early Warning Score 2 Clinical Classification (NEWS2) to support the calculation of total score in ADaM.
name: National Early Warning Score 2 Clinical Classification Parameter Code
preferredTerm: CDISC ADaM National Early Warning Score 2 Clinical Classification Parameter Code Terminology
synonyms: National Early Warning Score 2 Clinical Classification Parameter Code
